sourcesContent:
<template>
  <n-config-provider :theme="dark ? darkTheme : null" :theme-overrides="myTheme">
    <n-message-provider>
      <router-view v-slot="{ Component }">
        <transition name="scale" mode="out-in">
          <component :is="Component" />
        </transition>
      </router-view>
    </n-message-provider>
    <n-global-style />
  </n-config-provider>
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref, provide } from 'vue'

import {
  NConfigProvider,
  NMessageProvider,
  darkTheme,
  NButton,
  NGlobalStyle,
} from 'naive-ui'

import myTheme from './theme.js'

const dark = ref(false)
// 向后代组件传递数据
provide('dark', dark)

</script>
<script>
export default {
  name: 'App'
}
</script>

<style scoped>
/* 路由动画 */
.scale-enter-active,
.scale-leave-active {
  transition: all 0.5s ease;
}

.scale-enter-from,
.scale-leave-to {
  opacity: 0;
  transform: scale(0.9);
}
</style>
